Title: The Couch
Plot: Elaine begins to date the guy who delivers Jerry's new couch. Kramer plans to start the pizza business he thought of back in "Male Unbonding" with Poppie. George joins a book club, but tries to rent the movie so he can bluff his way through the meeting. Jerry and Elaine's discussion of the abortion issue causes trouble for Poppie, Elaine's relationship & Jerry's new couch. George spends the evening with the family that has rented the film.
GuestStars: Jessica Hecht, Reni Santoni, David James Elliott, Robert Hooks, Denise Y. Dowse, Patton Oswalt, Diana Theodore, Mari Weiss, Tamar Cooper, Beverly C. Brown, Jeris Lee Poindexter
